name: S. Groner Associates
description:
S. Groner Associates (SGA) helps organizations with their communications needs, specifically regarding issues facing communities and the environment. SGA does this through social marketing, media relations, online outreach and social media.
SGA is unique in the fact that we are a team of individuals from a variety of disciplines (from technical to creative).
Our skills range from web design and programming to applied psychology and from journalism and theater to environmental engineering.
